General.Name: LBG Media PLC
General.Description: LBG Media PLC operates an online media publisher the United Kingdom, Ireland, Australia, the United States, and internationally. The company produces articles, celebrity interviews, documentaries, reality shows, political live-streams, and hard-hitting social purpose campaigns. It offers its products through various brands, such as LADbible, a news site; Gamingbible; SPORTbible, a website for sports; UNILAD Adventure; UNILAD Tech; UNILAD; ODDSbible; UNILAD Sound; and Tyla. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Manchester, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 20 Dale Street, Manchester, United Kingdom, M1 1EZ
